Package org.rapla.client

The client package is responsible for initialize the gui and the client-plugins and providing the services for the client application.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ClientExtension classes implementing ClientExtension are started automaticaly when a user has successfully login into the Rapla system.
ClientService This service starts and manages the rapla-gui-client.
ClientServiceContainer  
RaplaClientExtensionPoints Constant Pool of basic extension points of the Rapla client.
RaplaClientListener  
 

Class Summary
MainApplet The applet-encapsulation of the Main.class reads the configuration from the document-base of the applet and displays an applet with a start button.
MainWebclient  
MainWebstart  
RaplaClientListenerAdapter  
 

Package org.rapla.client Description

The client package is responsible for initialize the gui and the client-plugins and providing the services for the client application.
